one out of three parts shaded
two out of four parts shaded

questions.prompt: Which is bigger: 1/2 or 1/4?
questions.explanation: One half is larger than one quarter.

questions.prompt: If a chocolate bar is split into 4 equal pieces, one piece is __ of the bar.
questions.explanation: One out of four equal parts is 1/4.

questions.prompt: The cat is ___ the table (picture shows cat under the table).
questions.explanation: 'Under' shows the position below the table.

questions.explanation: 3rd means the one after the second.

questions.prompt: Turn right means turn __
questions.explanation: Right turn is to the right side.

sets.title: 1st Grade Math (Extension)
sets.subject: math
sets.description: Extended Cambridge Stage 1 practice with emphasis on multi-step word problems plus number sense, place value, operations, shapes, measurement, time, money, patterns, data, fractions, and position.
